title: Corda Group Policy Schema
description: Schema for the group policy file included in distributed CPIs.

fileFormatVersion.description: The version of the schema which this file format adheres to. This must remain at root level of the schema as the schema evolves.

groupId.description: The group ID (UUID) that this file relates to, or constant 'CREATE_ID' if a new ID must be generated. A new ID should be generated only for an MGM.

registrationProtocol.description: The fully qualified class name of the registration protocol implementation class.

synchronisationProtocol.description: The fully qualified class name of the synchronisation protocol implementation class.

then.$comment: Properties for a group policy for a static network

else.$comment: Properties for a group policy generated for a member by an MGM
Properties for an MGM group policy

className.description: Common regular expression for class names.

certificate.description: Common regular expression for certificates in PEM format. Matches on header and footer plus base64 data including padding and new lines.

mgmInfo.description: The member information of the group MGM which members should use to join a group. This will be a copy of the string-string map used to represent the MGM member info within Corda.

p2pParameters.description: All parameters required to configure the P2P communication before registration and synchronisation.

sessionTrustRoots.description: The trust roots for session initiation certificate verification.

sessionPki.description: The PKI type to use for session handling.

tlsTrustRoots.description: The trust roots for TLS certificate verification.

tlsPki.description: The PKI type to use for TLS handling.

protocolMode.description: The type of end to end session to use.

tlsType.description: What kind of TLS connections the group supports.

protocolParameters.description: All parameters required to perform the registration or synchronisation protocols.

sessionKeyPolicy.description: Whether to use combined or distinct keys for ledger signing and end-to-end session authentication

staticNetwork.description: The configuration for set up of a static network.

members.description: The member templates for the members to be added to the static network member list.

items.description: A member template as a map of values for a member to be added to the static network member list.

mgmProtocolParameters.description: All parameters required for an MGM to perform the registration or synchronisation protocols.

cipherSuite.description: Parameters of the cipher suite in use as a map of string to string.
